!comment: Integer (Milliseconds): Duration before the warning's time, to display the warning. Default: 6 Hours
Integer (Milliseconds): Duration after the warning's time, to display the warning. Default: 15 Minutes
List [{date: Date Obj. string, note: string}, ...]: List of pre-set dates. The date string must be any JS Date object parsable string. Note is a note to display when the warning is shown.
List [{pattern object}, ...]: List of patterns to repeat warnings.

repeatPatterns.!comment: List [hour, minute, second]: Time of day. Default: 3:00:00 AM
Integer/String (0-7, *): Day of week. Default: Sunday
Integer/String (0-7, *): Day of month. Default: Any/Ignored
